sections.comments: This is a core course for a Minor in Education, Interpersonal Development and for the Diploma in Education - Guidance Studies.This is an elective course for the Certificate in Health  and  Wellness.Registration is restricted to students in the Faculty of Education for the first three weeks of registration.The registration restrictions will be removed July 30, 2020.Registration will be blocked when all the seats are filled.A waitlist is available for this course - CNPS 427 W3A.

This is a core course for a Minor in Education, Interpersonal Development and for the Diploma in Education - Guidance Studies.This is an elective course for the Certificate in Health  and  Wellness.Registration is restricted to students in the Faculty of Education for the first three weeks of registration.The registration restrictions will be removed July 30, 2020.Registration will be blocked when all the seats are filled.A waitlist is available for this course - CNPS 427 W3C.

Waitlist for CNPS 427.Waitlist registration is restricted to students in the Faculty of Education for the first three weeks of registration.Waitlist works on a priority basis.Students in the Faculty of Education (DEDU, EDUC or UNCL) as well as BA MIN EDUC EMP INDV will be registered in the course before any other students.Students are moved from the waitlist into the course ONCE PER DAY.

description: The work of the beginning counsellor and guidance worker in assisting students with educational, vocational, and personal planning and decision-making.
